bibl.title: Sakral'naja arhitektura rimskih krepostej v Egipte. [Sacred Architecture of the Roman Fortresses in Egypt.]
bibl.note: The Roman principia with chapels of the Standards, the Genius castrorum and the Imperial cult in Egypt. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Issledovanija po istorii arhitektury i gradostroitel'stva. Issue 3.

bibl.seg: Dmitry Karelin, Sakral'naja arhitektura rimskih krepostej v Egipte. [Sacred Architecture of the Roman Fortresses in Egypt.]
Dmitry Shvidkovsky (ed.), Issledovanija po istorii arhitektury i gradostroitel'stva, Issue 3 (Moskva, 2012) pp. 57-82, 14 figg.; - 467-468.
The Roman principia with chapels of the Standards, the Genius castrorum and the Imperial cult in Egypt. - Avec résumé en anglais.
